instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3115 board works with battery only , !!!
threads.message: 820-3115 board work on battery only, does work with power adapter.but green light is on .. i changed the isl6259 still no result, also i notice pic 2 on isl chip votahe is not constant its moving between 15.5---16.6  , ppbus_g3h around 1.5v only

threads.title: 820-3115 board works with battery only , !!!
threads.message:
Check sense resistors first, R7020, R7021 and R7022 and traces as always, check ACIN and voltage on R7005 booth pins..

Do you have 12.6V stable???

threads.title: 820-3115 board works with battery only , !!!
threads.message: no 12.6v, only 1.5v.... ppbus g3 h missing

threads.title: 820-3115 board works with battery only , !!!
threads.message:
i think we have a dupe thread. doh. I moved your post to a new thread before I saw this one. 

R7005 is blown, check it!
